00029 #include "AbstractCellKiller.hpp"
00030 
00031 template<unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00032 AbstractCellKiller<SPACE_DIM>::AbstractCellKiller(AbstractCellPopulation<SPACE_DIM>* pCellPopulation)
00033         : mpCellPopulation(pCellPopulation)
00034 {
00035 }
00036 
00037 template<unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00038 AbstractCellKiller<SPACE_DIM>::~AbstractCellKiller()
00039 {
00040 }
00041 
00042 template<unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00043 const AbstractCellPopulation<SPACE_DIM>* AbstractCellKiller<SPACE_DIM>::GetCellPopulation() const
00044 {
00045     return mpCellPopulation;
00046 }
00047 
00048 template<unsigned DIM>
00049 void AbstractCellKiller<DIM>::OutputCellKillerInfo(out_stream& rParamsFile)
00050 {
00051     std::string cell_killer_type = GetIdentifier();
00052 
00053     *rParamsFile << "\t\t<" << cell_killer_type << ">\n";
00054     OutputCellKillerParameters(rParamsFile);
00055     *rParamsFile << "\t\t</" << cell_killer_type << ">\n";
00056 }
00057 
00058 template<unsigned DIM>
00059 void AbstractCellKiller<DIM>::OutputCellKillerParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile)
00060 {
00061     // No parameters to output
00062 }
